OUR PURPOSE
settings.content: LEMAlab is a registered health and wellness brand that distributes high-quality supplements and specialised neutraceuticals. It operates mainly as an e-commerce business.The products are all EU approved and manufactured and certified. They are distributed across European countries through the highest quality certification. Our distribution centre is located in Germany. We care for animal welfare and eco-responsible actions, and our collaborators must comply with our standards—including packaging, distribution and manufacture.

settings.title: Do you ship overseas?
settings.answer: We currently only ship to EU countries, but we are aiming to expand soon.

settings.title: How long will it take to get my order?
settings.answer: Orders are shipped daily. Depending on where you are, it could take between 2 to 7 days. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.

settings.title: What shipping carriers do you use?
settings.answer: We use all major carriers, and local courier partners. You’ll be asked to select a delivery method during checkout.

settings.title: How long does it take for FLEXIBLE collagen to work?
settings.answer: You should start noticing benefits anywhere between 4 to 12 weeks. Consistency is key.

settings.title: Any question?
settings.answer: You can contact us through our contact page! We will be happy to assist you.

settings.title: Our founder
settings.content:
Our founder is the world-renowned artist Erika Lemay. She has performed extensively as a soloist guest star with Cirque du Soleil, her Physical Poetry has been admired by more than 400 million worldwide.

She has become a disruptive icon in the world of live performance: Vanity Fair nominated her as the New Queen of Circus. Hollywood icon-maker Douglas Kirkland's latest book 'Physical Poetry Alphabet' is a tribute to Erika's craft. Her book Almost Perfect is being published in 2021. 

With strenuous hours of daily training and performances across all five continents with no off-season, she has meticulously created a bulletproof lifestyle—with the help of diligent supplementation and bio hacks—enabling her body to defy both gravity and human possibilities for decades. The career span of a physical artist is usually short due to recurrent injuries and the decline of elasticity in our joints as we age. Our founder spent a lifetime studying the matter and reversing the trend.

settings.quote: Our products are not tested in animals, we love and respect nature always. Our products are not tested in animals, we love and respect nature always.
